languages.text: Стоило кораблю завершить выход из варпа, как голос бесстрашно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана призвал матросов приступить к ремонту. Но не все, далеко не все откликнулись на этот зов — страх и отчаяние охватили их, как и меня.

traits.locale_text: Стоило кораблю завершить выход из варпа, как голос бесстрашно{mf|го|й} Лорда-Капитана призвал матросов приступить к ремонту. Но не все, далеко не все откликнулись на этот зов — страх и отчаяние охватили их, как и меня.

languages.text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.
languages.original_text: Стоило кораблю завершить выход из варпа, как голос бесстрашно{mf|го|й} Лорд-капитана призвал матросов приступить к ремонту. Но не все, далеко не все откликнулись на этот зов — страх и отчаяние охватили их, как и меня.

traits.locale_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

languages.text: En cuanto la nave salió de la disformidad, la voz de nuestr{mf|o|a} intrépid{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} ordenó a la tripulación que comenzara las reparaciones. Pero no todos, ni casi todos, acataron la orden, pues eran presa del terror y la desesperación como yo.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

traits.locale_text: En cuanto la nave salió de la disformidad, la voz de nuestr{mf|o|a} intrépid{mf|o|a} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana} ordenó a la tripulación que comenzara las reparaciones. Pero no todos, ni casi todos, acataron la orden, pues eran presa del terror y la desesperación como yo.

languages.text: 飞船刚一离开亚空间，我们无畏的舰长大人就下令修理飞船。但并非所有船员都听众了命令，或者说，只有少部分人采取了行动。剩下的船员都和我一样，心中满是恐怖与绝望。
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

traits.locale_text: 飞船刚一离开亚空间，我们无畏的舰长大人就下令修理飞船。但并非所有船员都听众了命令，或者说，只有少部分人采取了行动。剩下的船员都和我一样，心中满是恐怖与绝望。

languages.text: 船が歪みを抜けるとすぐに、恐れを知らぬロード・キャプテンの声がクルーに修理を始めるように命じた。しかし命令に従ったのは全員ではない。いや、全員とは程遠い数だった。皆、私と同じく恐怖と絶望に囚われていたのだ。
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

traits.locale_text: 船が歪みを抜けるとすぐに、恐れを知らぬロード・キャプテンの声がクルーに修理を始めるように命じた。しかし命令に従ったのは全員ではない。いや、全員とは程遠い数だった。皆、私と同じく恐怖と絶望に囚われていたのだ。

languages.text: Sobald das Schiff den Warp verließ, befahl die Stimme unseres furchtlosen Lord Captains der Besatzung, mit den Reparaturen zu beginnen. Aber bei weitem nicht alle, befolgten diesen Befehl, denn sie waren von Angst und Verzweiflung ergriffen, so wie ich auch.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

languages.text: À peine le vaisseau sorti du Warp, la voix de notre intrépide {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} a ordonné à l'équipage de commencer les réparations. Mais tous, loin s'en faut, n'ont pas obéi à cette injonction, saisis qu'ils étaient par la terreur et le désespoir, tout comme moi.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

traits.locale_text: À peine le vaisseau sorti du Warp, la voix de notre intrépide {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} a ordonné à l'équipage de commencer les réparations. Mais tous, loin s'en faut, n'ont pas obéi à cette injonction, saisis qu'ils étaient par la terreur et le désespoir, tout comme moi.

languages.text: Gemi öteboyuttan çıkar çıkmaz korkusuz Lord Kaptanımızın sesi, mürettebatın onarımlara başlamasını emretti. Bu emre herkes uymadı, hatta uymayanların sayısı hiç de az değildi. Korku ve umutsuzluğun pençesine düşmüşlerdi. Tıpkı benim gibi.
languages.original_text: As soon as the ship exited the warp, the voice of our fearless Lord Captain ordered the crew to begin repairs. But not all of them, far from all of them, heeded this order, gripped as they were by terror and despair, just as I was.

traits.locale_text: Gemi öteboyuttan çıkar çıkmaz korkusuz Lord Kaptan'ımızın sesi, mürettebatın onarımlara başlamasını emretti. Bu emre herkes uymadı, hatta uymayanların sayısı hiç de az değildi. Korku ve umutsuzluğun pençesine düşmüşlerdi. Tıpkı benim gibi.
